name: Archverse北碚——现代化建设与集团生活 | Archverse Beibei: Modernization and Group Life
description:
在Decentraland中，我们做了两件事，一是对北碚西部科学院、北温泉公园、知名文学家住所等建筑等复原，二是用历史图片、刊物等内容筹建北碚的现代化建设与集团生活的展览，让建筑和展览共同作为Decentraland中北碚的基底。后续，我们将开放共同书写的信息平台，让大家在其中讲述自己的故事。

On Decentraland, we have mainly put two things into practice. Firstly, we restored several the Science Institute of West China, the Northern Hot Spring Park and famous litterateurs’ residences; Secondly, historical pictures and publications were used for curating the exhibition “Archverse Beibei: Modernization and Group Life”, and laying down the foundation with both architecture and exhibition for Decentraland Beibei. For future updates, we intend to open an information platform for co-writing and let everyone share their stories.

name: 3 LUCKY WINNERS WILL BE RANDOMLY DRAWN

DUE TO OVERWHELMING AMOUNT OF PARTICIPANTS SO FAR, WE ARE GIVING AWAY NOT 1,  BUT 3 NFTEE WEARABLE TEE SHIRTS TO WEAR IN DECENTRALAND

THE 3 LUCKY WINNERS WILL BE RANDOMLY DRAWN ON THE 1ST OF FEBUARY 2022.

name: MOVEMENT by Cami Alberti
description:
I understood that the beauty of things is in an uninterrupted movement, just as we cannot stop breathing, nothing can stop moving, otherwise they would cease to exist.


Its fluidity carries with it a need to be constantly transformed, and in a direct way generates inevitable growth when it works together over time.


That said, in a void where nothing exists we could only observe the movement, and only this would make us be in the present.



One day I got up and decided that the blue circle would be to the left of the painting, the next day it was in the same place but inside of me it had already moved.


The constant and subtle movement represents the dynamism of what I understand as aesthetics.

name: Ainsley Gallery Soft Launch (presented by Last Slice)

A holiday themed scene complete with a special World of Women Christmas video & music. 

A special thanks to **@pipauldotio (twitter)** for the visual/audio presentation!

name: Maff Metaverse Art Fest
description:
We welcome you to the Maff Art Fest - the first festival organized in metaverse by a Russian company! 

In November Maff Metaverse organized an online hackathon to allow designers and programmers all over Russia to create their art objects in Decentraland. 

All players will have an opportunity to visit the park and see unique and creative objects that teams have been working hard on. 

Each area is different, starting with a digital temple and ending with an escape room. 

You can experience the absence of laws of physics and enjoy every aspect of the digital world to the fullest. 

By the way, free POAP for all attendees!

There is so much to see. Don’t miss it. You won’t be disappointed.

name: ICE CUBE x TREVOR JONES : MAN VS MACHINE
description:
In this collaborative body of work painter Trevor Jones and rapper Ice Cube have combined their creative abilities to explore and highlight a variety of compelling subjects and concepts. 

Beginning seven months ago this fusion of painting, music, animation, and other forms of tech innovation have developed into a series of distinctly unique NFTs and physical works of art.

name: Crypsybear Metaverse Charity
description: Crypsybear is socially critical art in the digital ecosystem whose proceeds go to children's aid projects.  Crypsybear NFTs will now be shown in the decentraland museum district for a limited time. To celebrate this event, all sales (100%) made during the exhibition will go to UNICEF.

name: Porvenir: One and Three Realms” (NFT series) by Isabel Englebert.
description:
After being presented in Miami Art Week 2021, and in the NFT festival Illumia, Englebert presents the series "Porvenir: One and Three Realms", comprised of NFTs “Wannabe Porvenir” & “Porvenir Selfie”, and large-scale sculpture “Porvenir”, as a contemporary take on Kosuth´s questioning on representation and meaning. 

The series reflects on the imminent consequences of rising sea levels, and the necessary role of the human species to reach solutions. The two NFTs examine how technology constitutes an intrinsic part of human development. “Wannabe Porvenir” stands in a digital realm, heightening the idea of technology as a means of achieving change. “Porvenir Selfie” refers to a registry by technology of the real scale artwork, embodying the transformation from the real world into the virtual realm.

name: The Rocking Uniquehorns Presents: JASMINEFIRE | LIVE Performance
description:
**JASMINFIRE** is a painter, recording artist and creative DJ who combines poetic lyricism with violin, cello, and Serato. Her live and recorded music ranges from light and meditative to trancelike and provocative, centering around powerful messages of self love, mental health, and the intricacies of relationships. After expressing much heartbreak and isolation detailed on her debut Baby Jazz EP (2019), her latest single, "Heart Chakra" (2021), celebrates affirmations of growth leading to a newfound soul liberation.

Jasminfire began as “Charly”, a painter and violinist in the violin-viola group Chargaux (est. 2010) writing and releasing music the duo performed for fans, NYC high fashion brands, and tech events. From 2012-2016 Chargaux performed their original works at the White House, the Guggenheim, Lincoln Center, the MoMA, PAMM (Miami),  ATL Jazz Fest, NYC Winter Jazz Fest, and the Roots Picnic. At the same time, they composed and stylized string arrangements for several albums by Kendrick Lamar (Good Kid m.a.a.d. City) and J Cole (2014 Forest Hills Drive, 4 Your Eyez Only, KOD) that all went on to earn Grammy nominations. Simultaneously Charly’s painting career also got alot of attention, showing at PULSE Art Fair, ArtHamptons, and debuting a solo exhibit at Catinca Tabacaru Gallery in LES. Chargaux disbanded in 2017 and in 2018 “Charly” moved to LA for a gap year, where she participated as an orchestral member of Beyonce’s historic Homecoming performance at Coachella (Beychella). She also continued exploring larger format canvas paintings, selling to private collectors. Most recently, Jasmifnire recorded herself as an entire orchestra for Kid Cudi’s newly released documentary on Amazon Prime. 

Jasminfire is currently painting and performing new releases and has bases in New York City and Asheville/the greater South. 

https://opensea.io/collection/jasminfiremusicvideos

https://jasminfiremusic.bandcamp.com/album/baby-jazz

https://open.spotify.com/artist/4pBLJBlYQVYJHIwBhhGbfv?si=wvT0yDH2TYuJOamqGTKNgw

--------------

name: SUNDAY FUNDAY Crypto Competition w/ $2500 in Prizes
description:
Join us on SUNDAY FUNDAY and finish your weekend off winning some prizes, hanging out with friends. 

Featuring $2500 USD in prizes in $DG up for grabs!

The top 5 high scorers (in points) for the evening will receive the following prizes:

1st place - $1000 USD in $DG

2nd place - $200 USD in $DG

3rd place - $125 USD in $DG

4th place - $75 USD in $DG

5th place - $50 USD in $DG

Points are based on total USD value winnings and players never receive negative points for losses.

name: Unity with DJ Rosa
description: Come dance, listen to music, converse, network enjoy the food, and have a great time.

name: Art with Heart - An Exhibition by Sevi Loves Art
description: Delve into the world of 9-year-old artist Sevi Agregado from the Philippines who discovered a love for art at age 5 when he took up painting for art therapy for his autism.

name: Twitch Stream Community DAO Voting
description: Every Monday I will be hosting a live stream on Twitch.tv/j_t_v. We will be going over each proposal and voting on them. The initial vote will be via twitch poll. The winning vote will then be executed on the DAO.

name: TALOS Team Meeting
Crypto Casino Night
description:
Start your week with DG at Casino Night, featuring blackjack and roulette playable with $MANA and $DAI! Cruise by to hang with friends, enjoy new DJ mixed sets, and win $DG prizes!

The top 5 high scorers (in points) for the evening will receive the following prizes:

1st place - $1000 USD in $DG

2nd place - $200 USD in $DG

3rd place - $125 USD in $DG

4th place - $75 USD in $DG

5th place - $50 USD in $DG

Points are based on total USD value winnings and players never receive negative points for losses.

There will be a 15 USD airdrop every 5 minutes to a randomly selected address from active players in MANA and DAI!

Join our Discord for more information: www.decentral.games/discord

See you there!

name: The Rocking Uniquehorns Presents -- Alien DJ Jack Frost | LIVE Performance
description:
**The TRU Band Room is lighting up the Metaverse again with a performance from alien DJ Jack Frost!** 

*Update: time change to 6pm PST, 2am UTC*

------------------------

**Jack Frost** is an Alien DJ and Beatmaker from a distant planet.  His ship crashed on Earth and he decided to stay a while. 

Jack is very well-respected in the Los Angeles music scene, and has production credits with major artists such as Pusha T and the Wu Tang Clan.

Jack is currently building “Area 51," an immersive space themed nightclub entertainment experience inside the Metaverse. His fans are the MetaFrosties and they will soon be running rampant inside the Metaverse.

The Area 51 Space Pass NFT’s are minting Dec 17-18. 

Dream Bigger. Join Us.

Follow Area 51 Space Pass NFT on Twitter @SpacePass51
Follow Jack on Twitter @NFTFrost 
Follow Jack on Instagram @jack_frost36
Website: www.spacepass.io

------------------

About The Rocking Uniquehorns: The Rocking Uniquehorns (TRU) are 9'990 NFTs rocking on the Ethereum Blockchain, randomly generated by combining over 300 regular, legendary and ultra rare traits.

🌍 https://rockinguniquehorns.com  

💬 https://discord.gg/4EYj8JVxva

🐥 https://twitter.com/Uniquehorns_nft

name: Crypto Competition at The Aquarium every Tuesday
description:
Join us at The Aquarium Casino at 7:00PM Eastern / 11:00PM UTC for our Crypto Competition with the chance to win a variety of our new wearables.

We have some great swag set up throughout the ocean floor including our Aquarium Menagerie Fish Bowl helmet and one of the last chances to pick up our MMA gear! Come enjoy the Underwater Paradise and listen to some great beats while checking out some sweet new wearables for your collection!
Claim the POAP!

Aquarium gear airdropped to players every 15 minutes! The crypto competition awards the top 10 high scorers the following prizes:

1st place - Limited Holy Ones T- shirt

2nd place - Limited Holy Ones T- shirt

3rd place - 4Skin Libre Full Outfit (Mask, Upper, Lower)

4th place -4Skin X MMATV Fighter Body & Fighter Legs

5th place - 4Skin Libre Mask And Upper

6th - 10th - 4Skin X MMAtv Hoodie + 4Skin X Prim3 Hoodie

name: #NFTuesday | The Decentraland Report
description:
Every #NFTuesday we get together in the metaverse to explore, discover, and win NFT's! 


Come to meet with friends , have fun, and a chance to amp up your collection of blockchain goodies. 

Brought to you by The Decentraland Report, we put together a fun scavenger hunt that will send you running around to find hidden treasures!

Here's how we play:

~ Get an extra +10 Points to your score by collecting the POAP at the event start location (-78, -54)

~ Tune in LIVE to hear the hints and action at https://www.Twitch.TV/KevinOnEarth999 (Please Follow :D)

~ You will be presented with a hint to locate a place like MetaZoo International, or maybe to bust a dance move in front of your favorite CROMULON NFT

~ Take a snapshot/screengrab/photo, and submit your answer on https://xpand.gg/community/the-decentraland-report  

~ Win extra points before and during the game by answers trivia questions that come up on twitter (@KevinOnEarth999)

~ We will count up the score and announce winners right on our Xpand channel (https://xpand.gg/community/the-decentraland-report)

It's that simple! 


Sponsored by amazing brands like the Metakey, DC Metaverse Studios, Rovi AI, Snarky Sharkz, Harrison First, Altcoin Radio and NFT Artists like Remo Camero , this event has become almost a tradition for our community, and you are welcome to join anytime!

See you on #NFTuesday!

Some of our Partners:
The Meta Key
Decentraland
Warriors of Aradena

name: TIME TO TALK - Mental Health Support Group - Aspen Strong
description: Please join us as we host a live discussion on mental health and wellness in the metaverse. We invite you to come listen and share stories of struggling and surviving mental health in a safe and confidential environment. The more we talk, the more we heal.

name: Treating Low Back Pain
description: Informative talk on low back pain, a brief overview, how to treat it & things you can do to help yourself - inline with the current evidence, by an Osteopath.

name: "Black is Beautiful" - Stunning Charcoal Art Exhibition
description: Explore the transformation of ancient handmade art form to NFTs

name: Bufalo Metaverse Tour @ the Sugar Club
description:
Sugar Club Metaverse presents ! 

Bufalo ia a producer from Paris which has created a really strong and singular universe inspired from the "Far West" culture, blending Country, Folk, Deep House and House to create a new genre called "Futuristic Western Music". With more than 750k streams on Spotify, massive collaborations like « Country Come To Paris » with Django Unchained’s top singer and grammy-nominated singer Brother Dege, or the first-ever metaverse dj tour, Bufalo is definitely one to keep an eye on for the upcoming years. »

The first-ever Metaverse Dj Tour by Bufalo is a series of 5 events that will happen between December and February in 5 different venues of Decentraland:

The Rocking Uniquehorns, The Sugar Club, The Nyan Cat Club, The Metazoo, and The DJenerates Arena.

For each event, Bufalo will perform a dj set from Radio FG studios in Paris, the biggest radio for electronic music lover in France. The dj set will be displayed in the Metaverse and broadcast at the french radio at the same time, as well as video live-streamed across Radio FG social networks and website.

Join our discord : https://discord.com/invite/46RKBu8
Follow us for giveaways: https://twitter.com/SugarClub_

name: How To Treat Low Back Pain
description: Understand your body, empower yourself. Evidence based information on Low Back Pain - Hosted by an Osteopath who regularly sees patients with the issue, practicing in Reigate, Surrey, UK.

name: Sugar Club Metaverse w/ Nils Bokanowski
description:
Sugar Club Metaverse present !

Artist & Producer Bokanowski is a musician and a true visionary. Nils is making a debut premiere in the metaverse at the Sugar Club .

Bokanowski is fast making his mark as a creator of strong melodies and will be releasing a new exclusive track.
https://www.instagram.com/bokanowski.nils/

Come check out the livestream grab a Poap and enjoy the show !

discord: https://discord.com/invite/46RKBu8
Follow us for giveaways: https://twitter.com/SugarClub_

name: Pony Bradshaw • Purple Bee Live E62
description:
Purple Bee TV presents Pony Bradshaw, performing a live streaming concert from our studio in Wyldwood, TX.  

A singer/songwriter with a soulful voice who spins thoughtful, atmospheric tales that live somewhere between country, rock, and blues, Pony Bradshaw is somewhat of a late bloomer. After taking up music in his early thirties, the Georgia-based musician made a name for himself in open mics and clubs. After signing with Rounder Records in 2018, and putting out Sudden Opera, his debut record, he decided to part ways with the historic label to have more control.  Bradshaw’s most recent record, Calico Jim (1/29/21), was released via Black Mountain Music, a small independent label out of Greensboro, NC, and recorded in Little Rock, AR, at Fellowship Hall Sound. ⚡️

💜  Donate 
Our interactive live streams are free to watch, but powered by your donations, which go to directly support the artists and crew. Any donation amount will receive an email granting access to an exclusive POAP NFT for this event. http://purplebee.org/donate
